languages.text: "Намекаете, что подобное не под силу человеку? Но ведь я — не человек, я — инструмент Империума, один из многих. А Империуму под силу все. Если я потерплю неудачу, по моим стопам придет другой. Именно так наша раса и совершает немыслимое — руками конкретных исполнителей в конкретных ситуациях. Так что ваш скепсис не оправдан".

"Do you mean to say that a human is not capable of such a feat? But I am not just a human — I am an instrument of the Emperor's will, one of many. And the Imperium is omnipotent. If I were to fail, another would follow in my footsteps. That is how Humanity makes the impossible possible: with the hands of particular people in particular circumstances. Your scepticism is unwarranted."
languages.original_text: "Намекаете, что подобное не под силу человеку? Но ведь я — не человек, я — инструмент Империума, один из многих. А Империуму под силу все. Если я потерплю неудачу, по моим стопам придет другой. Именно так наша раса и совершает немыслимое — руками конкретных исполнителей в конкретных ситуациях. Так что ваш скепсис не оправдан".

traits.locale_text: "Do you suggest that a human is not capable of a feat like this? But I am not a human — I am a tool of the Imperium, one out of many And the Imperium is omnipotent. If I would fail, another one would come in my footsteps. This is the exact way our race makes the impossible possible — with the hands of particular people in the specific situations. So your scepticism is unfounded."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

If I would fail, another one would come in my footsteps. This is the exact way our race makes the impossible possible — with the hands of particular people in the specific situations. So your scepticism is unfounded."

If I were to fail, another one would come in my footsteps. This is the exact way our race makes the impossible possible: at the hands of particular people in specific situations. So your scepticism is unfounded."

If I were to fail, another one would come in my footsteps. This is the exact way our race makes the impossible possible: at the hands of particular people in specific situations. If I were to fail, another would follow in my footsteps. That is how Humanity makes the impossible possible: with the hands of particular people in particular circumstances. traits.locale_text: "Do you mean to say that a human is not capable of such a feat? But I am not just a human — I am an instrument of the Emperor's will, one of many. And the Imperium is omnipotent. If I were to fail, another would follow in my footsteps. That is how Humanity makes the impossible possible: with the hands of particular people in particular circumstances. Your scepticism is unwarranted."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: « Vous croyez qu'un humain n'est pas capable d'une telle prouesse ? Mais je ne suis pas un simple humain : je suis un outil parmi tant d'autres au service de la volonté de l'Empereur, et l'Imperium est tout-puissant. Si je devais échouer, quelqu'un d'autre viendrait prendre la relève. C'est ainsi que l'humanité accomplit l'impossible, en laissant des individus bien particuliers s'occuper de problèmes bien précis. Votre scepticisme n'a donc pas lieu d'être. »
languages.original_text: "Do you mean to say that a human is not capable of such a feat? But I am not just a human — I am an instrument of the Emperor's will, one of many. And the Imperium is omnipotent. If I were to fail, another would follow in my footsteps. That is how Humanity makes the impossible possible: with the hands of particular people in particular circumstances. Your scepticism is unwarranted."

traits.locale_text: « Vous croyez qu'un humain n'est pas capable d'une telle prouesse ? Mais je ne suis pas un humain : je suis un outil de l'Imperium, un parmi tant d'autres. Et l'Imperium est tout-puissant. Si je devais échouer, quelqu'un d'autre viendrait prendre ma relève. C'est ainsi que notre race accomplit l'impossible, en laissant des individus bien particuliers s'occuper de problèmes spécifiques. Votre scepticisme n'a donc pas lieu d'être. »
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: «¿Quiere decir que un humano es incapaz de lograrlo? Yo no soy un mero humano, sino un instrumento de la voluntad del Emperador; uno de muchos. Y el Imperium es omnipotente. Si fracasara, otro seguiría mis pasos. Así es como la Humanidad hace posible lo imposible: con las manos de personas concretas en circunstancias concretas. Su escepticismo no tiene razón de ser».
languages.original_text: "Do you mean to say that a human is not capable of such a feat? But I am not just a human — I am an instrument of the Emperor's will, one of many. And the Imperium is omnipotent. If I were to fail, another would follow in my footsteps. That is how Humanity makes the impossible possible: with the hands of particular people in particular circumstances. Your scepticism is unwarranted."

traits.locale_text: «¿Insinúa que un humano no es capaz de lograr algo así? Yo no soy humano, sino una herramienta del Imperium; una de muchas. El Imperium es omnipotente: si yo fracaso, otro seguirá mis pasos. Así es como nuestra raza hace posible lo imposible, en manos de la gente correcta en las circunstancias correctas. Su escepticismo no tiene fundamento».
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: “你的意思是说，人类没有能力实现这样的壮举吗？不过，我并不仅仅是普通的人类，我是帝皇的工具，诸多工具中的其中一件。帝国无所不能，即便我失败了，另一个人也会紧随我的脚步不断向前。人类就是通过这样的手段，在特定的环境下，在特定之人的手中，实现了无数不可能完成的壮举。你的怀疑毫无根据。”
languages.original_text: "Do you mean to say that a human is not capable of such a feat? But I am not just a human — I am an instrument of the Emperor's will, one of many. And the Imperium is omnipotent. If I were to fail, another would follow in my footsteps. That is how Humanity makes the impossible possible: with the hands of particular people in particular circumstances. Your scepticism is unwarranted."

traits.locale_text: “你的意思是说，人类没有能力实现这样的壮举吗？不过，我并不是人类，我是帝国的工具，诸多工具的其中一件。帝国无所不能，就算我失败了，另一个人也会紧随我的脚步，不断向前。我们的种族就是通过这样的手段，在特定的环境下，在特定之人的手中，实现了无数不可能完成的壮举。因此，你的怀疑毫无根据。”
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: "Wollt Ihr damit sagen, dass ein Mensch zu einer solchen Tat nicht in der Lage ist? Ich bin aber nicht bloß ein Mensch. Ich bin ein Werkzeug des Willens des Imperators. Eines von vielen. Und das Imperium ist allmächtig. Würde ich scheitern, würde jemand anders in meine Fußstapfen treten. Genau so macht die Menschheit das Unmögliche möglich: durch die Hände bestimmter Personen in bestimmten Situationen. Eure Skepsis ist also unbegründet."
languages.original_text: "Do you mean to say that a human is not capable of such a feat? But I am not just a human — I am an instrument of the Emperor's will, one of many. And the Imperium is omnipotent. If I were to fail, another would follow in my footsteps. That is how Humanity makes the impossible possible: with the hands of particular people in particular circumstances. Your scepticism is unwarranted."

traits.locale_text: "Wollt Ihr damit sagen, dass ein Mensch zu einer solchen Tat nicht in der Lage ist? Ich bin aber kein Mensch. Ich bin ein Werkzeug des Imperiums. Eines von vielen. Und das Imperium ist allmächtig. Würde ich scheitern, würde jemand anders in meine Fußstapfen treten. Genau so macht unser Spezies das Unmögliche möglich: Durch bestimmte Personen in bestimmten Situationen. Eure Skepsis ist also unbegründet."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: 「人間にはこのような芸当はできないと言うのか？だが、私は単なる人間ではない。皇帝の意思を具現させるための数ある道具なのだ。帝国は全能である。もし私が失敗したとしても、別の者が私を継ぐだろう。これこそが、我々の種族が不可能を可能にする方法なのだ。特定の状況における特定の人々の働きでそれが成される。ゆえに、あなたの疑念は根拠のないものなのだ」
languages.original_text: "Do you mean to say that a human is not capable of such a feat? But I am not just a human — I am an instrument of the Emperor's will, one of many. And the Imperium is omnipotent. If I were to fail, another would follow in my footsteps. That is how Humanity makes the impossible possible: with the hands of particular people in particular circumstances. Your scepticism is unwarranted."

traits.locale_text: 「人間にはこのような芸当はできないと言うのか？だが、私は単なる人間ではない。皇帝の意思を具現させるための数ある道具なのだ。帝国は全能である。もし私が失敗したとしても、別の者が私を継ぐだろう。これこそが、我々の種族が不可能を可能にする方法なのだ。特定の状況における特定の人々の働きでそれが成される。ゆえに、あなたの疑念は根拠のないものなのだ」
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: "İnsanların böyle bir karşılaşmadan galip çıkamayacağını mı söylemeye çalışıyorsun? Ben sadece bir insan değilim. Ben, İmparator'un iradesinin araçlarından biriyim. İmparatorluk, her şeye kadirdir. Ben başarılı olamazsam bir başkası olur. İnsanlık, imkânsızı böyle başarır. Belirli durumlarda belirli insanlar görev alır. Kuşku duymana gerek yok."
languages.original_text: "Do you mean to say that a human is not capable of such a feat? But I am not just a human — I am an instrument of the Emperor's will, one of many. And the Imperium is omnipotent. If I were to fail, another would follow in my footsteps. That is how Humanity makes the impossible possible: with the hands of particular people in particular circumstances. Your scepticism is unwarranted."
